reviewText: I did NOT like it. technique was lousy for anything but the very specific rules under the knock down tournament.  I would NOT recommend it if you are looking to see any thing but that knock down type thing.  techniques are what I would expect from a white belt but the rules make it work.
This is garbage. There is no content whatsoever and the editorial review is a pack of lies.

The action is "so so" while the production quality is that of a high school project. If you were competing and your girlfriend filmed it you would watch it more than once, otherwise it's just a competition like any other.
The very best competiton videos are made by Champ Co.in Tokyo who have made it their speciality-videos from other souces are best borrowed from a library.
John Edwards, Editor
Dragon Times Magazine
The best tournament ever! I cannot wait to see 1998, 1999 and 2000's.
